mapper.select: SELECT A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, SUM(A.AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM KER_REPORT_MANPOWER_MONEY_VIEW A where TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') between #{param1} and #{param2} GROUP BY A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp

SELECT A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') year, SUM(A.AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM KER_REPORT_MANPOWER_MONEY_VIEW A where TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') between #{param1} and #{param2} GROUP BY A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY')

SELECT A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') year, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY-MM') month, SUM(A.AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM KER_REPORT_MANPOWER_MONEY_VIEW A where TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') between #{param1} and #{param2} GROUP BY A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY'), TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY-MM')

SELECT A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, (CASE WHEN a.DEPTYPE = 1 THEN '小区内' WHEN a.DEPTYPE = 2 THEN '小区外大区内' ELSE '大区外' END) DEPTYPE, SUM(A.AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM KER_REPORT_MANPOWER_MONEY_VIEW A where TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') between #{param1} and #{param2} GROUP BY A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, a.DEPTYPE

SELECT A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, (CASE WHEN a.DEPTYPE = 1 THEN '小区内' WHEN a.DEPTYPE = 2 THEN '小区外大区内' ELSE '大区外' END) DEPTYPE, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') year, SUM(A.AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM KER_REPORT_MANPOWER_MONEY_VIEW A where TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') between #{param1} and #{param2} GROUP BY A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY'), a.DEPTYPE

SELECT A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, (CASE WHEN a.DEPTYPE = 1 THEN '小区内' WHEN a.DEPTYPE = 2 THEN '小区外大区内' ELSE '大区外' END) DEPTYPE, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') year, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY-MM') month, SUM(A.AMOUNT) AMOUNT FROM KER_REPORT_MANPOWER_MONEY_VIEW A where TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY') between #{param1} and #{param2} GROUP BY A.CareerGroupText, A.LargeAreaText, A.SmallAreaText, A.MoneyBackDeptText, A.SaleDeptText, A.CustomerCode, A.CustomerName, A.ContractNo, A.ContractName, A.ContractAmount, A.ContractSoftwareAmount, A.SoftwareServiceAmount, A.DiscountRate, A.ContractSigningDate, A.ContractAssessmentDate, A.PROJECTID, A.ProjectName, A.ProjectAmount, A.ProjectFlagText, A.ProjectTypeText, A.AcceptanceStamp, TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY'), TO_CHAR(A.MONTH,'YYYY-MM'), a.DEPTYPE
